We streamline, communicates and develops B2B B2C with a 360 control

Our communications We are asking questions! You get the answers! Sale Trix is Sweden’s most international B2B B2C consultant. Our customers and partners across Europe. We work across the marketing field with analysis, planning, Sales, Implementation, Change, Review and Results. competence in the company

Sale Trix in Sweden is an aggressive and dynamic company that grew rapidly. We have offices in Malmo, the Center in a trendy and fresh local. We are in contact with some of the highest quality companies in Sweden. We have for years worked as key account manager, booker, Sales Managers, Sales, Business Developer, Manager, Team Leader over Sweden in order to enhance the effectiveness of various Swedish and international companies.

  • We care about our customers. It can be seen in our results We are always looking for a challenging job in a growing company? We want to continue to develop the selected mission portfolio in the new company? Once we have decided and we will start a collaboration, here we go? What is the next step in your company development! You send us an email and we will contact via phone sale@saletrix.com

Our mission is to contact the selected individuals or companies in Sweden to offer your products or services! We can also look forward samarbetpartners to you! We offer different optimal solutions for you as our customer, we help you to always stay one step ahead! In addition to a confidential co-operation as well as a great opportunity to develop your company with our expertise, offers Sale Tricks you:

  • Best performance
  • Great opportunities to develop new products.
  • The ability to create new contacts in the industry and build a network for the future We have a positive attitude and have easy access to new contacts with people, and companies
